alert.note: Alert for Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 6:14AM EST until January 30 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Essex County in Vermont. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities along with areas of blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin after the noon hour and be heaviest during the late afternoon and early evening before ending around midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
